00021 #define _MSKFileData_HEADER_

00023 /*! \file MSKFileData.h This file provides reading capaibilities for MSK files.
00024  */
00025 
00026 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00027 
00028 #include <cstring>
00029 #include <fstream>
00030 #include <list>
00031 #include <string>
00032 //
00033 
00034 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00035 
00036 namespace affxmsk
00037 {
00038 
00039 /*! A type to hold the indicies for a probe set */
00040 typedef struct _ProbeSetIndiciesType
00041 {
00042         /*! The name of the probe set */
00043         std::string probeSetName;
00044 
00045         /*! The list of indicies for the probe set */
00046     std::list<int> indicies;
00047 } ProbeSetIndiciesType;
00048 
00049 /*! An STL list of ProbeSetIndiciesType objects */
00050 typedef std::list<ProbeSetIndiciesType> ProbeSetIndiciesList;
00051 
00052 /*! An STL constant iterator for the ProbeSetIndiciesList object */
00053 typedef ProbeSetIndiciesList::const_iterator ProbeSetIndiciesListConstIt;
00054 
00055 /*! An STL list of probe set names */
00056 typedef std::list<std::string> ProbeSetList;
00057 
00058 /*! An STL constant iterator for the ProbeSetList object */
00059 typedef ProbeSetList::const_iterator ProbeSetListConstIt;
00060 
00061 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00062 
00063 /*! Stores the contents of a MSK file.
00064  *
00065  * The mask file contains two sections. The first section stores a list of probe sets which
00066  * is used by the scaling and normalization functions of the MAS5 algorithm. The second section
00067  * defines the list of probe pairs to ignore in the MAS5 algorithm.
00068  */
00069 class CMSKFileData
00070 {
00071 public:
00072         /*! Constructor */
00073         CMSKFileData();
00074 
00075         /*! Destructor */
00076         ~CMSKFileData();
00077 
00078 protected:
00079         /*! The name of the MSK file */
00080         std::string m_strFileName;
00081 
00082         /*! An error string when a read error occurs */
00083         std::string m_strError;
00084 
00085         /*! The array type in the mask file */
00086         std::string m_strArrayType;
00087 
00088         /*! The list of probe set indicies */
00089         ProbeSetIndiciesList m_Indicies;
00090 
00091         /*! The List of probe sets */
00092         ProbeSetList m_Sets;
00093 
00094 public:
00095         /*! Sets the file name.
00096          *
00097          * @param name The name of the MSK file.
00098          */
00099         void SetFileName(const char *name) { m_strFileName = name; }
00100 
00101         /*! Gets the file name.
00102          *
00103          * @return The file name.
00104          */
00105         const char *GetFileName() const { return m_strFileName.c_str(); }
00106 
00107         /*! Gets the array type.
00108          *
00109          * @return The probe array type in the mask file.
00110          */
00111         const char *GetArrayType() const { return m_strArrayType.c_str(); }
00112 
00113         /*! Gets the number of probe set indicies in the mask file
00114          *
00115          * @return The number of probe set indicies in the mask file
00116          */
00117         int GetProbeSetIndiciesListCount() const { return (int) m_Indicies.size(); }
00118 
00119         /*! Gets the number of probe sets in the mask file.
00120          *
00121          * @return The number of probe sets in the mask file.
00122          */
00123         int GetProbeSetListCount() const { return (int) m_Sets.size(); }
00124 
00125         /*! The error string if a read error occurs
00126          *
00127          * @return The error string if an error occurs
00128          */
00129         std::string GetError() const { return m_strError; }
00130 
00131         /*! Returns the probe set indicies iterators
00132          *
00133          * @param begin The head of the list.
00134          * @param end The end of the list.
00135          */
00136         void GetProbeSetIndiciesIterators(ProbeSetIndiciesListConstIt &begin, ProbeSetIndiciesListConstIt &end);
00137 
00138         /*! Returns the probe set iterators
00139          *
00140          * @param begin The head of the list.
00141          * @param end The end of the list.
00142          */
00143         void GetProbeSetIterators(ProbeSetListConstIt &begin, ProbeSetListConstIt &end);
00144 
00145         /*! Reads the contents of the file.
00146          *
00147          * @return True if successful
00148          */
00149         bool Read();
00150 
00151         /*! Checks for the existance of a file.
00152          *
00153          * @return True if the file exists
00154          */
00155         bool Exists();
00156 
00157         /*! Clears memory associated with the class */
00158         void Clear();
00159 };
00160
